turns.text: Still failing — the Proton auth token has likely expired and needs re-authentication. This requires interactive PTY login which I can't do unattended (needs the Proton account password). I'll note this and move on.

args.content:
# 2026-02-18

## Email System Down
- Hydroxide auth token expired — `Invalid username or password` on IMAP login
- Restored backup auth.json from `/data/workspace/.hydroxide-backup/` — still fails
- Needs `hydroxide auth` re-run with PTY mode + Proton password
- Will need Andy's help or to look up stored credentials to re-auth
